description: Manage and access your static proxy IPs from NinjaProxy. Retrieve your proxy IPs, get specific proxies by index, and obtain ready-to-use proxy configurations for HTTP requests. Simplify proxy management and integration for your applications.

NINJAPROXY_API_KEY.description: Your NinjaProxy API key from ninjaproxy.com

capabilities.name: set_api_key
capabilities.description: Set the API key for accessing the NinjaProxy service

capabilities.name: get_my_proxies
capabilities.description: Get your assigned static proxy IPs

capabilities.name: get_proxy_by_index
capabilities.description: Get a specific proxy from your list by index (0-based)

capabilities.name: get_proxy_config
capabilities.description: Get proxy configuration for making HTTP requests
